name: Kanem
startIntroPart2: Can you build a civilization that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Get out of my way, hurry up!
attacked: Fine, this war shall last for centuries to come!
defeated: Alright, destroy Kanem, because i can always form a new kingdom anyway...
introduction: We have been focred to move to these fertile lands, we are Kanem..!
tradeRequest: Welcome, care for an exchange of things?
uniques: [+1 Gold, +3 Food] from [Lake] tiles [in all cities]

name: The Mapuche
startIntroPart2: Can you build a civilization that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: It comes to war. Mapuche shall use your own weapons against you!
attacked: I knew you could not be trusted! We have long prepared for this war. Have you?
defeated: We resisted to the last, but it was too late... too late.
introduction: I am Lautaro, the Swift Hawk. Mapuche honor me with respect. Will I see the same from you?
tradeRequest: Our crops are ripe this time around, would you like some?
uniques: [+2 Gold, +1 Culture] from every [Farm]

name: The Māori
startIntroPart2: Can you build a civilisation that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Ka mate! Ka mate!
attacked: Look at the big civ leader over there with the war declaration! Great job, mate. Really shows off how hard you are.
defeated: I have done my utmost, but your strength was greater. My heart, at least, will beat undefeated.
introduction: Kia Ora! You approach the land of Aotearoa, land of the Māori
tradeRequest: Here are gifts of pounamu, korowai cloaks and huhu grubs.
uniqueName: Land of the Long White Cloud
uniques: Enables embarkation for land units <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles <starting from the [Ancient era]>
[+1] Sight <for [Embarked] units>

name: Bavaria
startIntroPart2: Can you build a civilization that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: In this war, surely we will be victorious!
attacked: This kingdom is stronger than you think, its about time you learned.
defeated: You'll never take me alive!
introduction: Welcome, I am Ludwig II, The Swan King. king of Bavaria.
tradeRequest: Would you like a trade agreement with Bavaria?
uniques: Gain a free [Castle] [in all cities] <starting from the [Renaissance era]>

name: Shawnee
startIntroPatt2: Can you build a civilization that can stand against the test of time?
declaringWar: Your people are changing our way of life, so we need to defend it from you...
attacked: You cannot just remove us from our land, it's not right!
defeated: Fine, maybe it might be better to just let go... What a shame.
introduction: Hello? We are the Shawnee, why have you come here?
tradeRequest: Your arrival is respected. Now, what are we trading?
uniques: [+2 Faith] from [Hill] tiles [in all cities]

name: Medina
tradeRequest: May Allah bless you...
uniques: Free [Great Prophet] appears <upon entering a Golden Age>

name: Mozambique
startIntroPart2: Can you build i civilization that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: I wish for peace, but your actions force us to go to war...
attacked: I knew you would do this, only warmongers like you would do this!
defeated: And, as soon as it started, Mozambique has fallen.
introduction: Hello! I am Nelson Mandela. I strive for justice and equality around the world.
tradeRequest: Ready for an agreement? I can even show you some dugongs while you are here.
uniques: [+1 Gold, +1 Happiness, +1 Culture] from [Trading post] tiles [in all cities] <in [Coastal] tiles>

name: Vijayanagar
startIntroPart2: Will you build a civilisation that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: It's about time our empire expanded, so be gone!
attacked: Vijayanagar will not bow down to you, our empire will thrive with your land under our rule.
defeated: I have fought my final battle, I am now yours...
introduction: I am Krishnadevaraya, emperor of the Vijayanagara Empire, Lord of the Jewelled Throne of Karnataka, Protector of Brahmins and Cows and Lord of Three Kings.
tradeRequest: Ready to negotiate? our deals are always fair.
uniques: May buy [Great General] units for [420] [Culture] [in all cities]

name: Yolngu
startIntroPart2: Can you create a civilisation that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Leave us alone, take this as a message...
attacked: Why? Why did we ever need this cruelty towards us!
defeated: If you want us in your society so bad, then here we are...
introduction: Hello, We are the Yolngu. Are you looking to trade too?
tradeRequest: Hey, we've come very far to ask you this..!
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Food] from [Fishing Boats] tiles [in all cities]

name: Nassau
declaringWar: Nassau charges to victory. Prepare yourself; enemy of Nassau!
attacked: Our royalty will not be taken by invaders such as you.
defeat: We are only a shadow of our former, more greater selves...
introduction: The House of Nassau-Weilburg welcomes you to our recently formed duchy of Nassau.
tradeRequest: I am sure you do enjoy the view?
uniques: [+50]% Strength for cities <when defending>

name: The Sassanid
declaringWar: It is about time to expand our empire, either resist or join our empire!
attacked: This is either really wise, or really foolish of you.
defeated: To fall to religion or power, both with the same meaning.
introduction: You stand in front of the great Sasanian Empire, King of Kings of Iranians and non-Iranians.
tradeRequest: This will help dearly, my ally.
uniques: [+35]% Strength <for [All] units> <vs cities>

name: Funan
declaringWar: We shall sink you ships to the bottom of the sea!
attacked: Our coastlines guarded, ready to take you on.
defeated: My kingdom, lost to invaders; what chaos...
introduction: I am Neang Neakii, queen of this trading kingdom. you should probably just call me Soma, foreigner.
tradeRequest: Come on..! our kingdom doesn't run on nothing.
uniques: [+3 Gold, +1 Science] from each Trade Route <before the [Medieval era]>

name: The Timurids
declaringWar: It's time to take back what is rightfully ours!
attacked: We will not lose, not this time.
defeated: It's time to rest, for both of us...
introduction: Welcome, stranger. You stand infront of the great emirate of the Timurids..!
tradeRequest: Trade? I guess if you say so.

name: Angola
declaringWar: I will no longer let your chaos continue.
attacked: You cannot upset Angola with this war, we have faced much worse..!
defeated: So you have won, I wonder what you'll do now.
introduction: We are the People's Republic of Angola, let us now if you want to discuss anything!
tradeRequest: Yes, we can surely find the right deal for us both.
uniques: [+20]% [Production] [in all cities] <when below [5] Happiness>

name: Pagan
declaringWar: I am not the one for war, but it must be done...
attacked: We offered peace, and you showed war. we will remember.
defeated: As Burma falls, I hope my brothers will find more peace than I had...
introduction: I am Sithu II, also known as Narapati Sithu or Cansu II of the Pagan Dynasty.
tradeRequest: We hope this trade is fair?
uniques: [+2 Faith, +2 Culture] [in capital] <during a Golden Age>

name: Noongar
declaringWar: If I have to kill you, I will!
attacked: Yes, declare war, it's not going to change anything...
defeated: Do what you will, the Noongar will never die out.
introduction: I am Midgegooroo, and behind me is Noongar country.
tradeRequest: Hey, put on this buka while you're here...
uniques: [+2 Food, +1 Culture] from [Pasture] tiles [in all cities]

name: Muscovy
declaringWar: Prepare, for you shall be one of the first invaded to gather the Russian lands!
attacked: You think you can invade us? We will change your mind quickly...
defeated: There goes the idea of Russia being the third Rome...
introduction: So, you must be who everyone is talking about? I am Ivan the Great! future unifier of all Russia!
tradeRequest: What do you have for me?
uniques: [+30]% Strength <when at war>

name: Bohemia
declaringWar: To arms! Bohemia will fight you.
attacked: God will protect us and the Duchy.
defeated: This is not the last time we meet...
introduction: Welcome to Bohemia, and I am their Duke, Bořivoj I.
tradeRequest: We have traders coming over, so what do you say?
uniques: [+2 Faith] from every specialist [in all cities]

name: Samoa
declaringWar: I didn't want to do this, but you've forced me to.
attacked: I will defend my people, no matter what!
defeated: We weren't strong enough, but our pride is stronger.
introduction: I'm Malietoa Tanumafili II, may I visit your country as well?
tradeRequest: Here is our trade offer, friend!
uniques: [+15]% [Food] [in all cities]

name: Nazca
declaringWar: You cities shall suffer a great flood!
attacked: I promise you... If we ever capture you, your head will be gone!
defeated: Our culture now fades... We hope for you to have a better future then ours.
introduction: We are the Nazca. would you like to see our lines?
tradeRequest: We have maize, whale teeth and even pottery for sale... which would you like?
uniques: [-30]% construction time for [Improvement] improvements <in [Featureless] tiles>

name: Normans
declaringWar: Disagreement has gone on for far too long... We must Conquer!
attacked: This throne is mine, no one will take it from me.
defeated: If I must step down then I will...
introduction: Who are you? to be welcomed by me, William the Conquerer?
tradeRequest: So, where is this agreement..?
uniques: [2] XP gained from combat <for [Military] units>
[+1 Culture] from all [Faith] buildings

name: Aragon
declaringWar: This is the day, we begin the reconquesta!
attacked: We won't lose!
defeated: Maybe we underestimated you... Go on.
introduction: Hey, are you interested in learning our growing language? from the king of Aragon?
tradeRequest: 'Let's trade!' ...it means we want to trade in Catalon.
